title: Family Relationships and Adult Autonomy
description: As an adult IDD community member with family connections I want to maintain family relationships while exercising adult autonomy So that I am seen as an adult family member, not a perpetual child
content:
Feature: Family Relationships and Adult Autonomy
  As an adult IDD community member with family connections
  I want to maintain family relationships while exercising adult autonomy
  So that I am seen as an adult family member, not a perpetual child

  Background:
    Given Jordan is 26 years old and lives independently in a group home
    And Jordan has a family of origin (parents and two siblings)
    And Jordan's family is learning to respect Jordan's adult autonomy
    And the family_elohim helps coordinate family support with dignity

  Scenario: Maintaining regular family contact on own terms
    Given Jordan's parents want to stay connected
    And Jordan values family relationships
    When Jordan decides how often to communicate with family
    Then the personal_agent helps Jordan set communication preferences
    And the interface shows simple options (daily calls, weekly visits, etc.)
    And Jordan's communication preferences are communicated to family
    And the family_elohim helps family honor Jordan's boundaries
    And Jordan experiences autonomy over family connection frequency
    And Jordan's adult status is respected through choice

  Scenario: Participating in family decisions as adult member
    Given Jordan's family is planning a vacation together
    And Jordan is invited to join the family trip
    When the family discusses vacation options
    Then Jordan participates in the planning with accessible support
    And the personal_agent presents destination options visually
    And Jordan can express preferences about activities and timing
    And Jordan's vote counts in family decision-making
    And the family treats Jordan as an adult participant, not a child
    And Jordan experiences being a valued family member with voice

  Scenario: Managing financial oversight with dignity
    Given Jordan's parents have financial guardianship
    And Jordan is learning money management skills
    When Jordan makes purchases with their allowance
    Then the personal_agent helps Jordan track spending
    And parents can monitor for safety without controlling every choice
    And Jordan has autonomy within appropriate boundaries
    And the family_elohim balances oversight with independence
    And Jordan's financial learning is supported, not prevented
    And Jordan experiences growing financial autonomy

  Scenario: Coordinating family support without infantilization
    Given Jordan sometimes needs family help with complex tasks
    And Jordan's mother tends to be over-protective
    When Jordan requests help with a medical appointment
    Then the personal_agent sends the help request to family
    And the family_elohim reminds parents about supported decision-making
    And Jordan's mother helps Jordan understand options
    But Jordan makes the final decision with support
    And Jordan's adult autonomy is preserved through the interaction
    And the family learns to support without taking over

  Scenario: Celebrating holidays and traditions as adult participant
    Given Jordan's family celebrates holidays together
    And Jordan has their own traditions in the group home
    When Thanksgiving approaches
    Then Jordan decides where to spend the holiday
    And the interface helps Jordan weigh options (family vs. housemates)
    And Jordan's choice is honored by both family and household
    And if Jordan chooses family, they participate as an adult guest
    And Jordan's preferences about holiday activities are considered
    And Jordan experiences adult autonomy in family traditions

  Scenario: Navigating sibling relationships as equals
    Given Jordan has two younger siblings who are now adults
    And sibling relationships are evolving
    When Jordan's siblings gather for a family event
    Then Jordan participates as a peer adult sibling
    And the Value Scanner helps coordinate sibling care exchanges
    And Jordan's contributions to siblings are recognized (encouragement, presence)
    And siblings treat Jordan as brother/sister, not as someone to manage
    And the family_elohim helps siblings navigate appropriate support
    And Jordan experiences adult sibling relationships

  Scenario: Setting boundaries around family involvement
    Given Jordan's father often visits unannounced at the group home
    And Jordan values the visits but wants more notice
    When Jordan expresses desire for planned visits
    Then the personal_agent helps Jordan communicate boundaries
    And the interface provides simple language for boundary expression
    And the family_elohim communicates Jordan's preference to father
    And Jordan's father learns to respect Jordan's adult boundaries
    And Jordan's autonomy is supported through boundary maintenance
    And the relationship improves through mutual respect

  Scenario: Including family in milestone celebrations appropriately
    Given Jordan is celebrating one year at their library job
    And Jordan wants family to recognize this achievement
    When Jordan plans a celebration
    Then Jordan decides who to invite from family
    And the personal_agent helps Jordan send invitations
    And the celebration honors Jordan's accomplishment as a worker
    And family celebrates Jordan's success, not just their participation
    And Jordan experiences family recognizing their adult achievements
    And Jordan's contributions are valued, not just their effort

  Scenario: Receiving family inheritance and gifts with agency
    Given Jordan's grandmother passed away and left Jordan an inheritance
    And Jordan has the right to benefit from the inheritance
    When the family discusses the inheritance
    Then Jordan participates in decisions about the money
    And the personal_agent helps Jordan understand inheritance options
    And if guardianship requires oversight, it's done with dignity
    And Jordan has voice in how the money is used for their benefit
    And Jordan's personhood and rights are fully respected
    And the family_elohim ensures Jordan's interests are protected

  Scenario: Coordinating care during family member illness
    Given Jordan's mother becomes seriously ill
    And the family is coordinating care support
    When the family discusses how to help
    Then Jordan is included in family care planning
    And the personal_agent helps Jordan understand the situation
    And Jordan can offer contributions at their capability (visits, calls)
    And Jordan's care offerings are recognized and valued
    And the family doesn't automatically exclude Jordan from caregiving
    And Jordan experiences being a contributing family member in crisis
    And Jordan's capacity to give care is honored

  Scenario: Transitioning from child to adult in family system
    Given Jordan turned 26 and family dynamics are shifting
    And parents are learning to see Jordan as an adult
    When family interactions reveal old patterns (treating Jordan as child)
    Then the family_elohim surfaces the pattern respectfully
    And the system provides education about adult autonomy for IDD people
    And Jordan can express feelings about wanting adult treatment
    And the family receives support for the transition
    And Jordan's growth toward greater autonomy is celebrated
    And the family system evolves to honor Jordan's adult status

  Scenario: Managing family crisis with supported participation
    Given there's a family emergency requiring quick decisions
    And Jordan's input is important but time is limited
    When the family gathers to respond to the crisis
    Then the personal_agent helps Jordan understand the situation quickly
    And the interface presents information in most accessible format
    And Jordan's voice is heard even under time pressure
    And the family doesn't automatically exclude Jordan from decisions
    And supported decision-making works even in crisis
    And Jordan's family membership is honored in difficult times
